title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
Introducing the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat, the perfect solution for keeping your space warm and cozy during the colder months. This compact and portable heater is designed to provide efficient heating while taking up minimal space.

With a power range of 750W to 1500W, this space heater offers customizable warmth to suit your needs. You can choose between low heat, high heat, or even utilize the air circulation fan mode for refreshing airflow. The PTC Ceramic heating element ensures rapid heat generation, allowing you to feel the warmth within just 2 seconds.

Safety is a top priority with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater. It features overheat protection to automatically shut off the device if it exceeds safe temperatures. Additionally, the tip-over protection with a shutoff angle of 45 degrees ensures peace of mind, as the heater will turn off if accidentally knocked over.

This space heater is ETL certified, meeting the highest safety standards. It is suitable for various environments, including your home, dorm, office, or kitchen. The sleek black color and compact design make it a stylish addition to any space.

Measuring at just 7.72 inches in width, 6.38 inches in depth, and 9.13 inches in height, this heater is lightweight and easy to move around. Weighing only 2.6 pounds, you can effortlessly transport it from room to room.

Enjoy the benefits of intuitive controls and a built-in thermostat, allowing you to easily adjust the temperature to your desired level. The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater operates quietly, with a noise level below 45 dB, ensuring a peaceful environment.

This ceramic portable heater fan is powered by electricity, making it convenient and easy to use. Its low thermal resistance ensures energy efficiency, while the portable design allows you to place it wherever you need warmth the most. With an intended coverage area of 200 square feet, it is perfect for small to medium-sized rooms.

Upgrade your heating solution with the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat. Stay warm and comfortable throughout the colder seasons with this reliable and efficient space heater.

Safety is a top priority with this space heater. It is equipped with overheat protection, automatically shutting off if it detects excessive heat. The tip-over protection feature ensures your peace of mind, as it will turn off the heater if it is tilted at an angle of 45 degrees or more.

Featuring a PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient) heating element, this space heater quickly generates heat in just 2 seconds. You won't have to wait long to feel the warmth. The noise level is below 45 dB, guaranteeing quiet operation, so you can focus on your work or enjoy a peaceful sleep.

The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater is ETL certified, meeting the highest safety standards. Its sleek black color adds a touch of elegance to any room decor. The power source is electric, making it easy to use in any indoor setting.
